edited_stories.edited_story_text: Joe and I renewed our vows in a very exotic location. First we took a hike in the beautiful countryside. Then we took part in a local tradition of painting our hands. There was a woman officiant who performed the service. Our witnesses were a few locals from the area. After the ceremony, we walked hand in hand around the gardens. It was a special day and a special trip.
